name: WordPress w/ Elementor (scraped styles and scripts)
description: Replaces the built-in blog and webpages with WordPress + Elementor. The styles are brought in by scraping the html of the site to find the stylesheets and style tags.

preInstall.instructions: You should first install the WP GraphQL plugin to your website: https://www.wpgraphql.com/docs/quick-start#install-from-your-wordpress-dashboard

postInstall.instructions: You should now update the ENV variable for your WordPress GraphQL endpoint.
